description: CD Genomics provides high-quality data and integrated bioinformatics analyses services for targeted bisulfite sequencing including bisulfite conversion, primer/probe design and validation, hybridization/PCR amplification, library preparation, DNA sequencing and data analysis. CD Genomics uses both commercially designed capture arrays and custom-designed capture libraries to fully meet your research objectives. Please feel free to contact us for more information. We look forward to cooperating with you in the near future.
name: Targeted Bisulfite Sequencing
